page.title: 13GARDENS and PETS IN VILLAGE
page.content: {SURVEY RETURN FROM CROSS SECTION OF {VILLAGE OF WILLAND. (100 RETURNS) {______________________________________ {DO YOU HAVE A GARDEN? } YES{95%}NO{5% {HAVE YOU A GREENHOUSE?}YES{37%}NO{58% {HAVE YOU A LAWNMOWER? }YES{83%}NO{14% {DO YOU GROW FRUIT/VEG? }YES{71%}NO{27% {HOW MANY TREES HAS YOUR GARDEN ? {0=38%___1=14%___2=12%___3=7%___4=0%___ {5= 7%___6= 1%___7= 2%___8=4%___9=0%___ {OVER 10=19% {______________________________________ {DO YOU HAVE A PET ? } YES {78%}NO{32% {WHAT TYPE OF PET HAVE YOU? CATS______{48% DOGS______{30%} RABBITS___{13%} FISH______{13%} HORSES____{ 6%} OTHERS____ SHEEP/LAMBS, CHICKENS, DUCKS, BUDGIES AND FROGS. {--------------------------------------
